name: Xarver

screenshots.caption: Xarver in action: Roots on the left, Trees on the right.

short_description: XML carver which can carve damaged or non-standard XML out of any file. It rebuilds the XML tree, along with giving the offsets for all the carved XML data. This tool was developed for the DFRWS 2010 Forensics Challenge.
